verbose_text: [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] Every year, about six million patients undergo MRI studies of which 30% are performed using Gd based contrast agents (CAs), which significantly reduce the spin-lattice relaxation time T 1 of water protons leading to an increase of the signal intensity and improved contrast.
evidence: CAs), which significantly reduce the spin-lattice relaxation time T 1  of water
